text:
@GregAbbott_TX hmmmmmmm....

Wow , Has Texas a vaccine ? 

Are ya thinking the summer heat will kill it ?
Texas is ready to re-open so COVID19 just toggles off and goes away 
It won’t come back ? 
Are you expecting a second phase ?
